keyMoments.description: Confronts Kalifa to retrieve the key needed to free Robin
keyMoments.significance: Begins one of Sanji's most defining and controversial character moments

keyMoments.description: Explains that his code of chivalry was beaten into him as a child and that he will never kick a woman, even if it costs him his life
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the deep-rooted origin of Sanji's unwavering adherence to his chivalrous code

keyMoments.description: Suffers complete defeat at Kalifa's hands, unable to defend himself due to his code preventing him from fighting women
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the severe practical limitations of Sanji's principles, even when his crew's mission is at stake

relationships.description: Kalifa is Sanji's opponent, but his code of chivalry prevents him from fighting her
Nami steps in to fight Kalifa after witnessing Sanji's defeat

keyMoments.description: Uses her Awa Awa no Mi powers to drain Sanji's strength, rendering him completely helpless
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the devastating effectiveness of her Devil Fruit ability against defenseless opponents

keyMoments.description: Defeats Sanji brutally, kicking him through the ceiling
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Kalifa as a formidable opponent and sets up her battle with Nami

abilities.description: Kalifa spreads soap bubbles on Sanji's body, draining his physical strength

relationships.description: Exploits Sanji's code of chivalry to defeat him without resistance
Nami vows to fight Kalifa after she defeats Sanji

keyMoments.description: Successfully escapes from Kumadori and steals his key
keyMoments.significance: Acquires one of the CP9 keys needed to free Robin, showing her resourcefulness

keyMoments.description: Witnesses Sanji's defeated body falling through the ceiling and vows to fight Kalifa herself
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Nami's growth as a fighter and her loyalty to her crewmates

relationships.description: Escapes from Kumadori's attacks and steals his key
Vows to fight Kalifa after seeing what she did to Sanji
Nami is determined to avenge Sanji's defeat

keyMoments.description: Loses his temper after being mocked for his giraffe form and bisects the entire Tower of Justice with Rankyaku: Amane Dachi
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the devastating power of combining Zoan Devil Fruit abilities with CP9 techniques

abilities.description: Kaku spins his elongated giraffe neck to create a devastating cutting attack that slices the Tower of Justice in half

relationships.description: Fighting Zoro at the Tower of Justice
Fighting alongside Jabra against Zoro and Sogeking

keyMoments.description: Gets accidentally handcuffed to Sogeking with seastone handcuffs, forcing them to fight together while bound
keyMoments.significance: Creates a challenging handicap that forces improvisation in combat

relationships.description: Forced to fight while physically handcuffed together
Fighting Kaku while handcuffed to Sogeking

keyMoments.description: Accidentally handcuffs himself to Zoro while trying to use seastone handcuffs on the CP9 agents
keyMoments.significance: Creates a comedic yet difficult situation that handicaps both fighters

relationships.description: Accidentally handcuffed together, forcing cooperation in battle

keyMoments.description: Demonstrates his mastery of Seimei Kikan, controlling his hair and body with supernatural precision
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the advanced CP9 technique that goes beyond standard Rokushiki

keyMoments.description: Loses his key to Nami as she escapes from him
keyMoments.significance: Nami acquires one of the CP9 keys needed for the rescue mission

abilities.description: Grants complete control over all body parts, including hair manipulation
Uses Seimei Kikan to control his hair like tentacles to grab opponents
Uses Seimei Kikan to control digestion and body form

relationships.description: Nami escapes from Kumadori and steals his key

keyMoments.description: Uses Franky Boxing against Fukurou, combining standard boxing with his cyborg strength
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Franky's hand-to-hand combat style enhanced by his mechanical body

abilities.description: Standard boxing maneuvers made devastating by Franky's steel fists and cyborg strength

relationships.description: Fighting Fukurou at the Tower of Justice

keyMoments.significance: Continues his ongoing battle with Franky

relationships.description: Fighting against Franky at the Tower of Justice

keyMoments.description: Fights alongside Kaku against the handcuffed Zoro and Sogeking
keyMoments.significance: Two CP9 agents team up against the handicapped Straw Hats

relationships.description: Fighting together against Zoro and Sogeking
